Wait that's it? He won't even fuck her?? What a pussy...
The way she ends up thinking that cumming once a day is just something her body does on it's own is very nice in particular.

Surprisingly good, when he got handed the magic phone I was afraid it'd become boring but the way he's using it and the power depending on his sexual desire make it more interesting than I was expecting.
3/10 just the same shit over and over again
He could probably set it to where she wouldn't tell anyone. Maybe he'll experiment a little more in the next book.

The phone is only as powerful as his sexual desire. No longer being a pent up virgin would probably make it less powerful. Also, he can't be caught if he does it vicariously, he can be caught if he does it directly.
still a virgin lol, why rape her vicariously
